name: The Pirate Bay. Beautiful & Simple.
description: This is an edit of a current style by "tabinho". All coding that belongs to him, is his and I do not take any ownership over his coding. "http://userstyles.org/styles/29435/". Also the icons used are the property of the owner and do not belong to myself. Please feel free to post any bugs or critiques on the style. Thanks!
additional_info:
UPDATE 1/15/14
- Corrected TPB Url & included others they like to switch to
- Minor UI changes

UPDATE 5/26/13
- Fixed changes with icons
- Fixed a font issue in the search bar
- Updated for small changes to site

UPDATE 3/24/13
- Update the main bar in search
- Fixed a few bugs
